name: Don't Touch The Grussy
description:
Join Peddy, Grussy, Greddy and Pessy in this maze-based puzzle game.

Each character controls differently. Grussy is reversed, Greddy mirrors Horizontally, Pessy mirrors vertically.

Collect all the numbers in order and remember: Don't Touch the Grussy

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move
Z/C/B - Button O
X/V/N - Button X
ENTER - Pause

Restart levels or return to the Level Select in the Pause menu.

Controllers are also enabled
